mapper.select:
select count(*) from payv2_buss_company_app
and id = #{id}
and company_id = #{companyId}
and app_name like CONCAT('%',#{appName},'%')
and app_type_id = #{appTypeId}
and app_icon like CONCAT('%',#{appIcon},'%')
and app_img like CONCAT('%',#{appImg},'%')
and app_desc like CONCAT('%',#{appDesc},'%')
and app_desc_file like CONCAT('%',#{appDescFile},'%')
and app_copyright like CONCAT('%',#{appCopyright},'%')
and is_android = #{isAndroid}
and android_app_url like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppUrl},'%')
and android_app_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppMd5},'%')
and android_app_package like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppPackage},'%')
and android_apk_url like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkUrl},'%')
and android_apk_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkMd5},'%')
and android_apk_package like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkPackage},'%')
and android_apk_logo like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkLogo},'%')
and is_ios = #{isIos}
and ios_ipa_url like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaUrl},'%')
and ios_ipa_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaMd5},'%')
and ios_ipa_test_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaTestId},'%')
and ios_iphone_url like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneUrl},'%')
and ios_iphone_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneId},'%')
and ios_iphone_test_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneTestId},'%')
and is_web = #{isWeb}
and web_url like CONCAT('%',#{webUrl},'%')
and app_key like CONCAT('%',#{appKey},'%')
and app_secret like CONCAT('%',#{appSecret},'%')
and app_status = #{appStatus}
and app_pass_reason like CONCAT('%',#{appPassReason},'%')
and callback_url like CONCAT('%',#{callbackUrl},'%')
and is_new = #{isNew}
and is_delete = #{isDelete}
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time >= str_to_date(#{updateTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time <= str_to_date(#{updateTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

update payv2_buss_company_app
company_id=#{companyId},
app_name=#{appName},
app_type_id=#{appTypeId},
app_icon=#{appIcon},
app_img=#{appImg},
app_desc=#{appDesc},
app_desc_file=#{appDescFile},
app_copyright=#{appCopyright},
is_android=#{isAndroid},
android_app_url=#{androidAppUrl},
android_app_md5=#{androidAppMd5},
android_app_package=#{androidAppPackage},
android_apk_url=#{androidApkUrl},
android_apk_md5=#{androidApkMd5},
android_apk_package=#{androidApkPackage},
android_apk_logo=#{androidApkLogo},
is_ios=#{isIos},
ios_ipa_url=#{iosIpaUrl},
ios_ipa_md5=#{iosIpaMd5},
ios_ipa_test_id=#{iosIpaTestId},
ios_iphone_url=#{iosIphoneUrl},
ios_iphone_id=#{iosIphoneId},
ios_iphone_test_id=#{iosIphoneTestId},
is_web=#{isWeb},
web_url=#{webUrl},
app_key=#{appKey},
app_secret=#{appSecret},
app_status=#{appStatus},
app_pass_reason=#{appPassReason},
callback_url=#{callbackUrl},
is_new=#{isNew},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id,company_id,app_name,app_type_id,app_icon,app_img,app_desc,app_desc_file,app_copyright,is_android,android_app_url,android_app_md5,android_app_package,android_apk_url,android_apk_md5,android_apk_package,android_apk_logo,is_ios,ios_ipa_url,ios_ipa_md5,ios_ipa_test_id,ios_iphone_url,ios_iphone_id,ios_iphone_test_id,is_web,web_url,app_key,app_secret,app_status,app_pass_reason,callback_url,is_new,is_delete,create_time,update_time FROM payv2_buss_company_app
and id = #{id}
and company_id = #{companyId}
and app_name like CONCAT('%',#{appName},'%')
and app_type_id = #{appTypeId}
and app_icon like CONCAT('%',#{appIcon},'%')
and app_img like CONCAT('%',#{appImg},'%')
and app_desc like CONCAT('%',#{appDesc},'%')
and app_desc_file like CONCAT('%',#{appDescFile},'%')
and app_copyright like CONCAT('%',#{appCopyright},'%')
and is_android = #{isAndroid}
and android_app_url like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppUrl},'%')
and android_app_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppMd5},'%')
and android_app_package like CONCAT('%',#{androidAppPackage},'%')
and android_apk_url like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkUrl},'%')
and android_apk_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkMd5},'%')
and android_apk_package like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkPackage},'%')
and android_apk_logo like CONCAT('%',#{androidApkLogo},'%')
and is_ios = #{isIos}
and ios_ipa_url like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaUrl},'%')
and ios_ipa_md5 like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaMd5},'%')
and ios_ipa_test_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIpaTestId},'%')
and ios_iphone_url like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneUrl},'%')
and ios_iphone_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneId},'%')
and ios_iphone_test_id like CONCAT('%',#{iosIphoneTestId},'%')
and is_web = #{isWeb}
and web_url like CONCAT('%',#{webUrl},'%')
and app_key like CONCAT('%',#{appKey},'%')
and app_secret like CONCAT('%',#{appSecret},'%')
and app_status = #{appStatus}
and app_pass_reason like CONCAT('%',#{appPassReason},'%')
and callback_url like CONCAT('%',#{callbackUrl},'%')
and is_new = #{isNew}
and is_delete = #{isDelete}
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time >= str_to_date(#{updateTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time <= str_to_date(#{updateTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY ${sortName} ${sortOrder}

SELECT app.* FROM payv2_buss_company_app app left join payv2_buss_company comp on app.company_id=comp.id
and comp.channel_id = #{channelId}
and app.id = #{id}
and app.company_id = #{companyId}
and app.app_name like CONCAT('%',#{appName},'%')
and app.is_android = #{isAndroid}
and app.android_apk_url like '%'||#{androidApkUrl}||'%'
and app.android_apk_md5 like '%'||#{androidApkMd5}||'%'
and app.android_apk_package like '%'||#{androidApkPackage}||'%'
and app.android_apk_logo like '%'||#{androidApkLogo}||'%'
and app.is_ios = #{isIos}
and app.ios_ipa_url like '%'||#{iosIpaUrl}||'%'
and app.ios_ipa_md5 like '%'||#{iosIpaMd5}||'%'
and app.is_web = #{isWeb}
and app.web_url like '%'||#{webUrl}||'%'
and app.app_key like '%'||#{appKey}||'%'
and app.app_secret like '%'||#{appSecret}||'%'
and app.app_status = #{appStatus}
and app.app_pass_reason like '%'||#{appPassReason}||'%'
and app.callback_url like '%'||#{callbackUrl}||'%'
and app.is_delete = #{isDelete}
and app.create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and app.create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and app.update_time >= str_to_date(#{updateTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and app.update_time <= str_to_date(#{updateTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and (app.app_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') or app.app_key like CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%'))
ORDER BY app.create_time desc
select id from payv2_buss_company_app where company_id = #{companyId}
